name: Pinomania
overview: Pinomania is a puzzle board game, a clone of a classic game Pentomino with the appearance of as a static Tetris. The goal of the player is to fill a pattern picture with all the available blocks. The blocks may be turned in every direction and flipped. Each level allows to make a designated number of checks, showing correct placed blocks. The blocks may be removed from the board back to the clipboard. There is no limit of trials. After completing the level players receive a level code. The game consists of 80 levels all together, all use the same set of 12 blocks.
